comment: /**  * Applies the message to {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.Filter} to  * context.  */
code: /**  * Applies the message to {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.Filter} to  * context.  */ @Override public void apply(CamelContext context, HBaseRow rowModel) {     getFilters().clear().     if (rowModel != null) {         if (rowModel.getId() != null) {             byte[] value = context.getTypeConverter().convertTo(byte[].class, rowModel.getId()).             PrefixFilter rowPrefixFilter = new PrefixFilter(value).             addFilter(rowPrefixFilter).         }     } }
